game.name: Thrust
game.desc: The player has to penetrate various planets to attach a tow-bar to Kylstron Pods, and get out alive. In doing so you can stop the Intergalactic Empire from achieving its evil plan. The game is difficult enough to make a gamer curse, but fun enough to make one smile too!

game.name: VecZ
game.desc: SIMPLE ENTER THE VECZ AND TRY TO DESTROY ITS EMPIRE! AND OF COURSE: IT IS NOT ABOUT SHOOTEMUP ALL - IT IS ABOUT SURVIVE AND SHOOTEMUP IS ONLY ONE TACTIC!
